text: Tatthāyaṃ samayo acchinnacīvarā vā hoti bhikkhunī naṭṭhacīvarā vā ayaṃ tattha samayo
edit: Tatthāyaṃ samayo acchinnacīvarā vā hoti bhikkhunī naṭṭhacīvarā vā ayaṃ tattha samayo

translations.transtext: Here the proper occasion is this: The bhikkhunī's robe has been snatched away or destroyed. This is the proper occasion here.
